data: Across lots to the Brumble farm came the dusty apparition of a boy, a tousle-headed, freckle-faced, gaunt-eyed little fellow, clad in a sort of combination suit fashioned from a pair of overalls and a womanâ€™s shirtwaist.

David Dunne
A Romance of the Middle West
